long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Data Grabber" Chrome Extension simplifies your workflow by enabling easy collection and utilization of key data points from web pages. Ideal for managing inventory, filling out forms, or handling any task involving repetitive data entry, Data Grabber enhances your productivity and efficiency.

Key Features:

Pick Up Data:

Seamlessly collect part numbers, descriptions, or listing prices from any web page.
Highlight the desired text, right-click, and select the appropriate pick-up option from the context menu.
Store selected data locally for easy access and future use.
Drop Data:

Effortlessly insert picked-up data into any text field on any web page.
Right-click on the text field and choose the desired drop option.
Utilize the calculated price feature to apply predefined formulas to listing prices.
Apply Formulas:

Automatically calculate adjusted prices using predefined multipliers based on price ranges.
User-Friendly Interface:

Intuitive context menu options make data collection and entry straightforward.
Notifications provide clear feedback and error messages.
